nodes.text: The occupation of Lothal was an occupation by the Galactic Empire of the Outer Rim world of Lothal that occurred soon after the Clone Wars and the establishment of the Empire when Lothal's planetary government petitioned for aid and support. After the Imperial survey team discovered starship-manufacturing minerals beneath the surface, factories and mining facilities were dispatched within a week, along with a major garrison. Almost overnight, entire sectors of Capital City were emptied to pave the way for Imperial structures, and the citizens of Lothal responded with mass protests, resulting in mass arrests and crackdowns. Lothal's planetary government was pushed aside while an Imperial governorship was established.
